Title: Hakushaku to Yousei Specials
Description: ['Chibi-Earl and Chibi-Fairy. Every special focuses on another character, who will in their turn recite a poem by Shakespeare, that they feel describes their lives the best.']
Voices: ['Midorikawa, Hikaru', 'Sugita, Tomokazu', 'Mizuki, Nana', 'Koyasu, Takehito', 'Miyano, Mamoru', 'Kamiya, Hiroshi']
